spell.name: Incanter's Flow
spell.description: Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 20% increased damage and then diminishing down to 4% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.

spell.name: Ice Barrier
spell.description: Instantly shields you for 1 min, absorbing 16,726 damage. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage.

spell.name: Ring of Frost
spell.description: Summons a Ring of Frost for 10 sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become incapacitated for 10 sec.  Limit 10 targets.

spell.name: Supernova
spell.description:
Causes a pulse of arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing 6,490 Arcane damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage.  Max 2 charges



Replaces Frost Nova.

spec.name: Arcane
spec.description: Manipulate the arcane, destroying enemies with overwhelming power.

spell.name: Prismatic Crystal
spell.description:
Conjures a prismatic crystal at the target location, which is attackable by only the Mage, and takes 30% additional damage. 



When the crystal takes damage, it instantly releases a burst of energy dealing that damage, split evenly between all enemies within 8 yards.

spell.name: Cauterize
spell.description: Fatal damage will instead bring you to 35% health and then burn you for 28% of your max health over 6 sec.  This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

spell.name: Ice Floes
spell.description: Your next Mage spell can be cast while moving. Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.  Max 3 charges.

spec.name: Arcane
spec.description: Manipulate the arcane, destroying enemies with overwhelming power.

spell.name: Ring of Frost
spell.description: Summons a Ring of Frost for 10 sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become incapacitated for 10 sec.  Limit 10 targets.

spell.name: Incanter's Flow
spell.description: Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 20% increased damage and then diminishing down to 4% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.

spell.name: Ice Barrier
spell.description: Instantly shields you for 1 min, absorbing 16,726 damage. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage.

spell.name: Cauterize
spell.description: Fatal damage will instead bring you to 35% health and then burn you for 28% of your max health over 6 sec.  This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

spell.name: Meteor
spell.description: Calls down a meteor which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing 12,808 Fire damage, split evenly between all targets within 8 yards. Also burns the ground, dealing an additional 1,281 Fire damage every 1 sec for 8 sec to enemies in the area.

spell.name: Blazing Speed
spell.description: Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by 150% for 1.50 sec.  Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.

spell.name: Living Bomb
spell.description:
The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking 3,420 Fire damage over 12 sec. When this effect ends, or the target dies, it explodes to deal an additional 2,733 Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within 10 yards.



May be spread by Inferno Blast.

spec.name: Fire
spec.description: Ignite enemies with balls of fire and combustive flames.
